description: A CLIP file is a raster image file generated by the 2D drawing application Clip Studio Paint. It is similar to Adobeâ€™s PSD file and contains multiple layers to manage different graphics elements in the form of layers such as text, images, pen, pencil, brushes, and shapes. CLIP file format is used to design a number of different graphics types such as illustrations and animations. Clip Studio Paint application was developed by a Japanese company CELSYS, Inc. that was established in May 1991.
